::Vukodlak::

    He slumbered a deep slumber, and in it he relived all his=
 past mistakes over and over. This is what he dreamed:
    
    The Autobot=
s had been making a mosterous creature to battle the Decpticons. They had b=
uilt him smaller so he would be easy to control. He was quite ugly, and the=
y had decided to bring him on the Ark to finish. They put him in a Stasis P=
od of the day and left. Then the Decpticons attacked. 
    The monster had =
awoken. He left the safty of the Stasis Pod and learned of the Decpticons. =
He had drained one of it's mech fluid and learned much about their life, an=
d the Vivodes. He now considered himself one of these creatures, a Vivode D=
ecpticon.
    He knew the Ark was going to crash, and he programmed his pod=
 to exit and find a safe spot to land, he planned on becoming a major playe=
r in the upcoming war. It never happened. His Pod landed saftly. But it was=
 swallowed by the Earth. He lay dormant for centuries, and had learned of a=
ll that had happened. He had a connection to the Autobots, and thus could s=
ee the Great War. Then came the Beast Wars, and with it, Trantulas. He some=
how had a connection to this one as well, but not from the Autobot part of =
him, it was from the Vivode part. He watched the Beast Wars until the momen=
t Trantulas died. He knew that the time of his awakening was coming close a=
t hand. All he needed were pawns to bring him about.
    He had gone insane=
 while waiting and he now thought the Autobots would awaken and destroy all=
. He now thought that he had to destroy them, for his sake, and all Transfo=
rmers.

    And now he had them, Battera and Cerberus. They would bring abo=
ut the destruction of all Transformers decended from Autobot, his makers. V=
ivode Vukodlak would arise and bring forth carnage and destruction that all=
 the worlds to hear. Soon the Vivodes would inherit Cybertron, and all of i=
t's protecotrates, including Earth.

    Soon Vukodlak would awaken....
